mapper.sql: id, rule_strategy_id AS ruleStrategyId, content_detail_id AS contentDetailId, check_rule AS checkRule, create_by AS createBy, create_date AS createDate, update_by AS updateBy, update_date AS updateDate, remarks, del_flag AS delFlag
mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.datasource_id AS datasourceId, c.content_id AS contentId, c.column_name AS columnName, c.column_type AS columnType from admin_rule_strategy_content_detail d LEFT JOIN admin_column_rule_strategy s on s.id=d.rule_strategy_id LEFT JOIN admin_data_content_detail c on c.id=d.content_detail_id where s.id=#{id}
